mapper.select: SELECT name, zonecode, address, address_detail, birthday, phone, email, created_at, mileage, tall, weight FROM nextjs_shop_user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND withdrawal_status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT user_no, user_id, password FROM nextjs_shop_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND withdrawal_status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT user_id FROM nextjs_shop_user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND withdrawal_status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_phone_auth(user_no, phone_auth_token, phone, verification_code, connect_ip, connect_agent) VALUES(#{userNo}, #{phoneAuthToken}, #{phone}, #{verificationCode}, #{connectIp}, #{connectAgent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM nextjs_shop_phone_auth WHERE phone_auth_token = #{phoneAuthToken} AND is_used = 0 AND created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 190 SECOND)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_user(user_id, password, name, zonecode, address, address_detail, birthday, phone, email) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{zonecode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{email})

INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_user_address( address_name, recipient_name, address_phone, zonecode, address, address_detail, default_address, user_no) VALUES('HOME', #{name}, #{phone}, #{zonecode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, 1, #{userNo})
mapper.update: UPDATE nextjs_shop_user SET zonecode = #{u.zonecode}, address = #{u.address}, address_detail = #{u.addressDetail}, phone = #{u.phone}, email = #{u.email} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nextjs_shop_token(connect_ip, connect_agent, refresh_token, user_no) VALUES(#{connectIp}, #{connectAgent}, #{refreshToken}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no FROM nextjs_shop_token t JOIN nextjs_shop_user u ON t.user_no = u.user_no WHERE t.refresh_token = #{refreshToken} AND t.connect_ip = #{connectIp} AND t.connect_agent = #{connectAgent} ORDER BY t.created_at DESC, t.token_id DESC LIMIT 1
